name: VGS Collect.js and Stripe 3DS Flow Demo

VGS_PROXY.description: Full URL with credentials for the VGS outbound proxy: https://USERNAME:PASSWORD@<vault-id>.SANDBOX.verygoodproxy.com:8080

VGS_PROXY_CERTIFICATE_B64.description: VGS proxy certificate encoded as a base64 string

PUBLIC_URL.description: The public URL of the server without `/` at the end, https://{app-name}.herokuapp.com
